name: Couch Crusade
description:
Adventure with up to 3 friends into mysterious and whimsical dungeons.

Couch Crusade is a local multiplayer (couch coop) game where up to 4 players can navigate short boss encounters as different character classes.

Each play-through will last around 10-15 minutes.

Pizza and Drinks are highly suggested!

NOTE: This game is only setup for use with X-Box 360 Controllers.

This is an early access, alpha release, updated versions & more voice acting coming soon...
